sentences.en: As a commuter service, the ferry has outlived its usefulness(= is no longer useful ).
sentences.cn: 作为一种通勤服务，渡船已经没有用武之地了。

sentences.en: Badly written questions limit the usefulness of questionnaires.
sentences.cn: 问题设计得不好,调查问卷的用途就会打折扣.

sentences.en: His interest lay in the usefulness of his work, rather than in any personal credit.
sentences.cn: 他的兴趣在于所从事的工作是有用的，而不在于什么个人荣誉。

sentences.en: I was persuaded of the usefulness of his new device.
sentences.cn: 我相信了他的新装置的实用性.

sentences.en: In fact, men are outliving their usefulness.
sentences.cn: 事实上, 人已经过时了,无用了.

sentences.en: In terms of practical rock slope engineering, these methods have limited usefulness.
sentences.cn: 对于实际岩石边坡工程来说, 这些方法的实用性很有限.

sentences.en: It is of the greatest usefulness.
Man early learned the usefulness of weapons.
sentences.cn: 人类很早以前就知道了武器的用处.

sentences.en: The advisory group has outlived its usefulness.
sentences.cn: 顾问组已失去了它的作用.

sentences.en: The attitude of the parents toward the usefulness of what is learned must colour the way children approach school.
sentences.cn: 父母对学知识是否有用的态度必定会影响孩子对待学业的态度。

sentences.en: The index adds appreciably to the usefulness of the book.
sentences.cn: 索引明显地增加了这本书的实用价值.

sentences.en: The theory is of limited usefulness.
There are doubts about the usefulness of these tests.
sentences.cn: 这些试验是否有用，人们有所保留。

sentences.en: There is usefulness to the parachute.
Usefulness includes the fact the negatives have been calibrated.
sentences.cn: 所谓有用,是指在底片上要有标度.

words.tran_cn: 可用的；便于使用的（等于usable）
习惯的；二手的，使用过的
有用的，有益的；有帮助的

trans.tran_en: the state of being useful or the degree to which something is useful
